Package datastructure

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructure.Customer
  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Customers in this Application. Mirrors the customers table in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

                int divisionId,
                java.time.ZonedDateTime createdDate,
                java.lang.String createdBy,
                java.time.ZonedDateTime lastUpdateDate,
                java.lang.String lastUpdateBy)
        Create a Customer.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The id for this Customer.
        customerName - The name of this Customer.
        address - The address of this Customer.
        postalCode - The postal code of this Customer.
        phone - The phone number of this Customer.
        divisionId - The division ID for this Customer.
        createdDate - The date when this Customer was created.
        createdBy - Who created this Customer.
        lastUpdateDate - When this Customer was last updated.
        lastUpdateBy - Who last updated this Customer.

      • saveToDb

        public void saveToDb()
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        If a Customer with this Customer_ID exists in the database, then that record is updated. If not, a new record is inserted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs or this method is called on on a closed connection.
